name: Nugget: Whalemarine Rescue
description:
Nugget: Whalemarine Rescue

"A 2d side-scroller in which a diver must escort and maintain a whale-bus on a rescue mission to save as many stranded humans as possible"

Made in 5 days for the London South Bank University Game Jam, players escort Nugget,  a whale-bus, on a rescue mission in a flooded, frozen earth. Rescue survivors, avoid pufferfish, scare sharks away with your horn and feed Nugget shrimp in a 1-level side scroller inspired by "A-Whale-Bus" from the En L'an 2000 collection.

CONTROLS:

Player Movement: W - A - S - D 

Torch Control: Mouse

Trigger Whale's Horn: Press 'E' when player is hovering over Nugget (slightly buggy, prompt will show!)

Quit: Alt-F4

A GROUP 3 GAME:
